title: Shaquem Griffin joins to announce his retirement!
description:
Inspirational NFL and College star Shaquem Griffin drops by the show to talk about the end of his football career, and the next phase of his life. A man who has inspired millions talks about the league, his time playing the game, what he's learned... and also whether or not people are still sleeping on Russell Wilson. PLUS! We talk about the fallout of the KD non-decision, and how it affects the power structure of the East, and it's Wednesday, so you know we gotta talk Hard Knocks and Dan Campbell. Like, subscribe, share and enjoy! 
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit megaphone.fm/adchoices
itunes:author: ESPN, Jalen Rose, David Jacoby
